The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 3,302.90 crore. The company management includes Karan Thapar - Chairman, Sunil Pahilajani - Managing Director & CEO, Vikram Tandon - Director, Clive Hickman - Director, Vijay Rai - Director, Navneet Singh - Additional Director, Arvind Kumar Singhal - Additional Director, Monica Chopra - Whole Time Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 501455 and the NSE with an NSE Code of GREAVESCOT. Its Registered office is at 3rd Floor, Motilal Oswal Tower,,Junction of Gokhale and Sayani Road, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400025. Their Registrars are Sharepro Services (India) Pvt.Ltd.}
